moving

Class DamageText

  • java.lang.Object
    • moving.DamageText

  • public class DamageText
extends java.lang.Object
    The text that displays above the enemy/player when an enemy or the player gets hurt or healed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DamageText(java.awt.Graphics g, java.lang.Object o, java.lang.String text, java.awt.Color c)
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawText(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draws the damage text.
      boolean updateText()
      Updates the position and fading of the text.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DamageText

        public DamageText(java.awt.Graphics g,
          java.lang.Object o,
          java.lang.String text,
          java.awt.Color c)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        g - The object on which the graphics will be drawn.
        o - The object which this damagetext is locked to (i.e. will follow this object).
        text - The text that will display.
        c - The Color of the DamageText.

    • Method Detail

      • updateText

        public boolean updateText()
        Updates the position and fading of the text.
        Returns:
        True if this DamageText is done fading and should be removed, false if not.

      • drawText

        public void drawText(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the damage text.
        Parameters:
        g - The object on which to draw the graphics.
